title: en_windows_7_professional_with_sp1_x64_dvd
description:
Type .................: OS 
Platform .............: 64 Bit 
Image Format .........: Blu-ray or USB 
Burn Tested ..........: Yes 
Languages.............: English 
Installation..........: CD/USB             ---------------------------------------------------------------------
Hardware Requirements:

If you want to run Windows 7 on your computer, you need to have the following conditions. 

1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor. 

1 gigabyte (GB) RAM (32-bit) or 2GB RAM (64-bit). 

16GB of available hard disk space (32) or 20GB of available hard disk space (64). 

DirectX 9 graphics device (WDDM 1.0 or later 

Details: Internet access (fees may apply). 

According to the adopted resolution, video playback may require additional memory and advanced graphics hardware. 

For some Windows Media Center functionality, you may need to use a TV tuner and additional hardware. 

Windows Touch and Tablet PC functionality requires the use of specific hardware. 

HomeGroup requires a network and PCs running Windows 7. 

DVD / CD authorization requires a compatible optical drive. 

BitLocker requires the use of TPM 1.2. 

BitLocker To Go requires a USB flash drive. 

Windows XP Mode requires additional 1GB of RAM, 15GB of available hard disk space, and a hardware virtualization and can be turned on Intel VT or AMD-V processors. 

Music and sound require the use of audio output.
